[[Asylum Records|Asylum]]-Curb }} '''Trini Triggs''' (born August 8, 1965 in [[Natchitoches, Louisiana]]) is an American [[country music]] artist. In 1998, he released a self-titled album for MCG/[[Curb Records]]; produced by Chuck Howard and Anthony Smith,Flick, Larry (August 22, 1998). "Trini Triggs: Straight Tequila", ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' '''110''' (34): 16. the album produced three singles on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' Hot Country Singles & Tracks (now [[Hot Country Songs]]) charts that year.
